law.catch_line: Use of tar sands moneys by counties.
law.text: Moneys from tar sands distributed to counties under KRS 42.470(2) shall be used for economic development purposes as approved by the Department for Local Government.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 29, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 23, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 367, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002.
